Package com.cse110team24.walkwalkrevolution.mockedservices

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    MockActivityTestRule<LoginActivity extends android.app.Activity>
    TODO new activity test rule to forcibly remove app data Use this rule in your tests use it like this [this will the instance variable for the testing class] : [@rule] - no brackets public MockActivityTestRule mActivityTestRule = new MockActivityTestRule<>(LoginActivity.class); if you need to change what happens before the activity is launched, feel free to extend this class
    MockedApplicationAndroidTestRunner
    TODO - add testInstrumentationRunner 'com.cse110team24.walkwalkrevolution.mockedservices.MockedApplicationAndroidTestRunner' to the gradle file custom runner so we can control the instance of FirebaseApplicationWWR that is created
    TestAuth
    Contains the test implementation of AuthFactory and Auth.
    TestAuth.TestAuthFactory
    Creates instance of TestAuthService.
    TestAuth.TestAuthImplementation
    Test implementation of Auth.
    TestDatabaseServiceFactory
    Creates instances from one of 3 test implementations of DatabaseService.
    TestFitnessService
    inject this service like this inside the @setup method: FitnessServiceFactory.put(TEST_SERVICE, activity -> new TestFitnessService(activity));
    TestInvitationsDatabaseService
    Test implementation of InvitationsDatabaseService.
    TestMessage
    Test implementation of MessagingService.
    TestMessage.TestMessagingService
    Test implementation of MessagingService.
    TestMessage.TestMessagingServiceFactory
    Creates instances of TestMessage.TestMessagingService.
    TestTeamsDatabaseService
    Test implementation of TestTeamsDatabaseService
    TestUsersDatabaseService
    Test implementation of UsersDatabaseService.
